name: Kaos Kitties
description:
Kaos Kitties!

Quick, before your hooman comes home you must clean up the mess your kittens have made and get them back into their pen.  Everybody stay calm, but if your hooman notices the mess, it's game over!

Made by:

Artist: Katherine Rondot (@Katie_Rondot [Instagram] @Dashitatichou)

Composers/Recording Artists: Danny Witham, Csephus

Programmers:  Captain Dreadbeard [Twitch}, Jonathan Burtson (@SoluneDev [Twitch], @jburtson [Twitter])

Made for GDEX 2021 - Theme: "Calm"
